snippet: Cheri Young, whose husband was a longtime aide to John Edwards, traded jabs with a defense lawyer during cross-examination on Tuesday.
abstract: Cheri Young, whose husband Andrew was a longtime aide to John Edwards, trades jabs with defense lawyer during cross-examination in Edwards's federal corruption trial; Edwards is alleged to have used illegal campaign contributions to conceal an affair.
lead_paragraph: Cheri Young, whose husband was a longtime aide to John Edwards, traded jabs with a defense lawyer during cross-examination on Tuesday.

headline.seo: Cheri Young Proves Challenging Witness for Edwards Defense
headline.main: Edwards Defense Team Makes Few Inroads With Ex-Aide’s Wife on Witness Stand
headline.print_headline: Edwards Defense Team Makes Few Inroads With Ex-Aide’s Wife on Witness Stand
